    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadBalancer

        public LoadBalancer()
        Constructs a load balancer with the default configuration. Uses the round robing scheduling algorithm.

      • LoadBalancer

        public LoadBalancer(RmdConfig config)
        Constructs a load balancer with the specified load balancer.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration

      • LoadBalancer

        public LoadBalancer(ArrayList<JobServer> jobServers,
                    RmdConfig config)
        Constructs a load balancer with the given configuration. Defaults to the round robin scheduling algorithm
        Parameters:
        jobServers - The list of job servers
        config - The configuration

      • LoadBalancer

        public LoadBalancer(@NonNull
                    List<JobServer> jobServers,
                    @NonNull
                    BalanceStrategy balanceStrategy,
                    @NonNull
                    RmdConfig config)
        Constructs a new load balancer with the given configuration and load balancing strategy
        Parameters:
        jobServers - The list of job servers
        balanceStrategy - The strategy of which to use to balance the load
        config - The configuration
